nodes.text: The Vanjervalis system was located in the Slice portion of the Colonies. It shared its name with the computer conglomerate Vanjervalis Systems as well as the starship manufacturer Rendili/Vanjervalis Drive Yards, the latter of which was based at the Core Worlds planet Corellia.
The Vanjervalis system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square N-11.
